meanings.definition: Consisting of four parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The team worked together on a quaternary project.

meanings.sent3: The quaternary ingredients in the recipe made it extra special.
meanings.sent4: Her quaternary approach to problem-solving was both efficient and effective.
meanings.sent5: The quaternary structure of the building was symmetrical and pleasing to the eye.

meanings.sent1: She was the quaternary person to arrive at the meeting.

meanings.definition: A geologic period lasting from 2.6 million years ago to the present
meanings.sent1: Scientists study fossils from the quaternary to learn about ancient life.
meanings.sent2: The quaternary is the most recent period in Earth's history.
meanings.sent3: In geology class, they discussed the quaternary and its significance.
meanings.sent4: The quaternary marks the time when humans began to dominate the planet.
meanings.sent5: During the quaternary, glaciers covered much of the Earth's surface.
